title: Secant Line Calculator â€” Slope, Equation, Point-Slope, y-Intercept

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Slope: \( m = \dfrac{f(x_2) - f(x_1)}{x_2 - x_1} \) Point-slope: \( y - f(x_1) = m(x - x_1) \) Slope-intercept: \( y = mx + b \) where \( b = f(x_1) - m x_1 \)

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
